Articles.Content:
I got the idea to have a Research Center near/at KSC (for career mode).

You could unlock new parts or start researching on them (of course it will consume money). Maybe you could improve your engine's ISP.

What do u think of this idea? I think it would be a nice feature (maybe just for something like like "history mode" as an alternative to "creative" and "career" mode, if anybody want to play freely with all parts).

...I'm curious about your opinions

Edited July 28, 2013 by nomis

I'm pretty sure that's already planned.

... one day anyway.
